column1: Born in Netherstorm ; this maniacal tavern owner aims to discover their destiny.
Their youthful skin is covered by a woolen orange chestplate that bears a royal crest. It compliments their beautiful face.
Worked as a slave in Wintergrasp ; this cruel inscriptionist seeks to conquer their destiny.
They wear a royal orange suggestive outfit which  is a perfect fit with their relatively big toes.
